description: The camellia (Camellia japonica 'April Snow') is a stunning and versatile species of flowering plant, prized for its ability to thrive in many environments and its showy blooms. An evergreen perennial, this camellia is easily grown in the right climates and produces beautiful white double-petalled flowers in the spring. It is a low-maintenance plant, requiring moderate water and partial shade, and can grow up to 8 feet tall and 6 feet wide! Its white flowers provide a nice contrast to its glossy green leaves, making April Snow a wonderful addition to any landscape. It also makes a great specimen planting or hedge. For these reasons and more, the camellia 'April Snow' is an amazing plant.
